definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Sasuke sort of looks like itachi in this picture.
sentences.chinese: 佐助有点像在看这张照片鼬。

sentences.english: So there are a lot of photographs in this collection that no one has seen before.
sentences.chinese: 所以，在这部精选集里有很多照片是没有人看到过的。

sentences.english: By exposing under different light filters, photographs with different image contrast can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 曝光时使用不同滤色镜即可获得影像反差不同的照片。

sentences.english: I followed this kitty all around the places, and finally got this lovely shot.
sentences.chinese: 我追著它绕来绕去，最后终于等到这张可爱的照片。

sentences.english: This image is stark in its brutality but was the reality of the time.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片虽然很残忍，但是当时的真实写照。

sentences.english: Aguero in the heart a fiercely, flip phones photograph of her son.
sentences.chinese: 许仪心中一凛，翻出手机上儿子的照片。

sentences.english: She came across a pile of old photographs while she was clearing the attic.
sentences.chinese: 她打扫阁楼时偶然发现了一沓旧照片。

sentences.english: Attach one passport-size photograph of yourself in the space provided.
sentences.chinese: 将自己的护照大小的照片中所提供的空间。

sentences.english: Online photo sharing website but based on your real-life social network.
sentences.chinese: 根据你的现实社会关系来在线分享照片网站。

sentences.english: Fidel looked at monica and Dan, photographs, together with anger.
sentences.chinese: 菲德尔看着莫尼卡和丹特在一同的照片，怒火中烧。

sentences.english: So where's the pictures of the village theyare visiting?
sentences.chinese: 怎么没出现这个村庄的照片？

sentences.english: I asked myself when I saw your picture.
sentences.chinese: 我看见你的照片后这样问自己。

sentences.english: The picture appeared in all the Chinese newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 那张照片遍布中国所有的报纸。

sentences.english: The pictures came out AWESOME, as evidenced by my husband’s reaction.
sentences.chinese: 老公的反应证实照片实在太棒了。

sentences.english: Bleed photos off the edge of the page.
sentences.chinese: 出血的照片就可以超出页边。

definition: head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
to take a picture or video of oneself/to take a selfie/selfie
to take a joint photo/group photo
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
a person's face as seen from the front
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
